org.timepedia.chronoscope.client
Class View

java.lang.Object
  org.timepedia.chronoscope.junit.canvas.View
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.timepedia.exporter.client.Exportable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BrowserView
public abstract class View
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.timepedia.exporter.client.Exportable

View encapsulate platform specific behaviors, such as graphics rendering, timing, and CSS property retrieval. Views support asynchronous creation, therefore, the proper use of a view is to postpone operations until ViewReadyCallback is invoked.

createTimer

public abstract PortableTimer createTimer(PortableTimerTask run)
Create a timer capable of scheduling delayed execution of the given PortableTimerTask. PortableTimerTask is an abstract to ensure that View/Plot related code is not tightly bound to the browser's environment of GWT and can run in an Applet or Servlet environment as well.

Parameters:
run -
Returns:

flipCanvas

public void flipCanvas()
If double buffered, the frontCanvas is made invisible, the offscreen canvas is flipped to front, and the references to the front and back canvases are swapped.
